title: Introduction
description: Begin with a warm welcome to all SSC JE aspirants. Set the tone for an engaging learning experience by outlining the goals of the session.

title: Summary
description: Deliver the core technical knowledge required for SSC JE â€” focusing on Civil, Electrical, and Mechanical domains. Include key concepts, problem-solving techniques, and theoretical frameworks essential for both Paper I and Paper II.

title: Core Teaching / Main Lesson
description: Apply concepts through real-world engineering examples and previous year questions (PYQs).Demonstrate time-saving methods and step-by-step solution approaches.

title: Practical Demo
description: Engage students through live quizzes, polls, and problem-solving challenges.Address common doubts, share shortcuts, and improve conceptual clarity through interactive discussions.

title: Q/A Interaction
description: Recap all major concepts discussed in the session.Provide a concise summary, formula sheet, and key revision notes.Guide learners on what to focus on next for continuous improvement.
